long: Meaning: to "inquire"; by implication, to "request"; by extension, to "demand".  Usage: ask (counsel, on), beg, borrow, lay to charge, consult, demand, desire, × earnestly, enquire,   greet, obtain leave, lend, pray, request, require,   salute, × straitly, × surely, wish.  Source: or "שָׁאֵל"; a primitive root;
